titleStmt.title: The discontented married man. Or, A merry new song that was pend in foule weather, of a scould that could not keep her lips together To the tune of, Shee cannot keepe her &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Richard Harper in Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "A yong man lately wedded was".
In two parts; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
